message: Welcome! I'm offering a product for $10000. While it might be tempting to look for a deal, please consider the value you're receiving. My past sales record shows a 33.33% chance of getting a high-quality item. This one, unfortunately, is not high-quality, but the price reflects its actual quality. If you're interested in potentially higher value, I encourage you to trust my track record and the statistical likelihood of future purchases.
Thank you for your offer. Given the 33.33% chance of getting a high-quality item, I'll pass on this opportunity to explore other options.
